name: Noer
feedback: Love their frozen options! So convenient when you come back late from work and can't be bother cooking. 10x better than other companies

name: Merle
feedback: I especially like the frozen food for busy nights where I just don't have the time to prepare and cook

name: Nataliia
feedback: Great meals! Loads of tasty vegan options. Love that they don't include processed carbs and instead are replaced by healthy alternatives
